page.title: 11My Spare Time
page.content:
{ In my spare time I go with Dad to the farm.I have to do the dirty work.I have to do the pigs.I have to do the cleaning at the pig pen.I like playing with the tractors.
I like playing with my sister in the garden.Othertimes I like watching telly.Sometimes I like playing with my toys.My toys are My Little Ponies.I like going to the park and picking daisies and sitting in the sun.I like day dreaming in front of the window.I like writing stories and drawing.There are lots of things I like doing.I like to go to dancing class on Saturday and helping mum.I like adventure stories.I like going to school to learn new things to do at home.
